text: Brat'ya Yusufa po ottsu skazali drug drugu: "Nash otets, konechno, lyubit Yusufa i yego yedinoutrobnogo brata bol'she, chem nas, khotya my sil'ny i nas mnogo, i my mozhem prinesti yemu bol'she pol'zy. Predpochitaya Yusufa i yego brata nam, nash otets sil'no zabluzhdayetsya i yavno otoshol ot istiny
